name: Order Group
tagline: We develop modern products for modern people.
description:
Our Software House is a team of engineers and designers, who love development challenges. We are specialized in delivering bespoke IT solutions.
For years we’ve been working as a contractor and technology partner for big corporations & interactive agencies. In the past we have carried out websites, web and mobile apps for many different industries: financial, medical,management, real estate, transportation, events and even beauty.
